UC4fHgQmwCxDUqXQydFieg.text: Stopped by just as they were closing up shop. The smell drew us in. Sadly, they had just shut down for the evening, but they gave us a load of free crackling to go. It was the best crackling I have ever had, and I make pulled pork at least twice a month. They chatted with us awhile and made us feel very much at home.  Thanks for showing us a a good time! We will definitely come back next time we are in Edinburgh.

6bDnvQmGywne-pxwe9yPDQ.text: THE BEST PULLED PORK!  Deek spent his lifetime trying to make perfection and he's as close to it as humanly possible.  You will NOT be disappointed stopping by here for lunch! Highly recommended!
